LivTee Black Superior Leather Car Seat Back Headrest Hooks, Car Hook Hangers Interior Accessories for Purse Coats Umbrellas Grocery Bags Handbag, 2-Pack
Effective space saving: These universal headrest hooks can organize your back seat and floor debris in an orderly manner, avoiding grocery and shopping bags from rolling on the floor, and also prevent your handbag and food bag from driving Fall off the seat.
High quality: These back car headrest hooks made of metal and covered in leather, which make the hook sturdy and match your car seats perfectly. These hooks are soft and will not damage the car.
Easy to install: You can easily install these hooks without removing the headrest and without additional tools.
Powerful load capacity: Each box contains two hooks, and the sturdy material makes it able to bear 55 pounds and handle most of the sundries in the car.
Purchase with Confidence: Any issues or questions please feel free to contact us, we are always here to satisfy all of you.

From the brand

FIREPLACE TOOLS

SHEPHERD HOOK

GARDEN

BIRD FEEDER

NEW ITEM

GARDEN TOOLS

„ÄêPREMIUM QUALITY„Äë The height of the shepherd’s hook for outdoor is 32 inches and 1mm thicker steel makes it not easy to bend or deform when encountering strong winds. Powder-coated surface prevents rust effectively and makes it more durable. 0.3 inch diameter high-quality wrought iron makes our shepherd hooks for garden maintain a stable and upright condition. The new version shepherd hook has an extender for 2 different height options: 32 inches-21 inches.
„ÄêSTYLISH AND STABLE„Äë The upgraded wrought iron base has 3 prongs, which means that compared with the traditional two prongs, the stability and versatility will be enhanced. The shepherds hook is thicker and sturdy enough to hang bird feeders or solar Lights. Retro shape and classic black look of the shepherds hooks outside add beauty and elegance to your garden. Simple design also make the premium mental hooks easier to integrate into the garden scene.
„ÄêEASY TO USE„Äë The outdoor shepherd hook consists of 3 parts and can be installed easily. Each section can be quickly rotated to complete the assembly. No additional tools or accessories are needed, just screw each part together easily. The 3 prongs base makes the shepherds hooks for outdoor insert into the ground stably. Please attention: We don’t recommend hanging overloads objects on shepherd hooks or stick the hooks in the soft soil, which may cause them to topple over.
„ÄêWIDE APPLICATION„Äë Gtongoko shepherds hook for outdoor will add a sense of charm to any occasion, whether it is in your garden, lawn, or vibrant bushes around pathways. You can hang holiday decorations, small vases, solar lights, lanterns on it to add the desirable beauty. These heavy duty hangers are also very suitable for hanging flower balls on both sides of the wedding aisle, which will make your wedding more elegant and grand.
„ÄêOUR COMMITMENT„Äë We will try our best to ensure the quality of the small shepards hooks for outdoor. If you have any questions about our products in the purchase process, please contact us in time, and we will give you a satisfactory reply as soon as possible.

Previous page

  1. 1.Step the 3-prongs base into the ground completely with your feet

  2. 2.Install the pole and hook in turn.

  3. 3.Hanging your lanterns, solar lights, decorations on it.

Product Description

This is the most cost-effective product in the DIY class after many R&D and design configurations.

It is a wonderful companion for manual work.

This set of products includes everything you need. It is a must in your home garage. Standard and precision screwdrivers used to handle various sizes of work, it can effectively help you complete large and small tasks.Whether you are a mechanic or a DIY enthusiast, this set of products can accompany you for a long time and is a very practical and cost-effective partner. At the same time, it is also a great gift-giving option. Give it to husband, father, teacher, brother, and of course to female mechanics, including any DIY enthusiast. Anyone who receives this product will have nothing but praise.

21-PIECE MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED screwdriver: SL3 x 3″, SL4 x 3″, SL5 x 4″, SL6 x 4″, SL6 x 5″, SL6 x 6″, SL8 x 6″PHILLIPS screwdriver: PH0 x 3″, PH1 x 3″, PH2 x 4″, PH2 x 5″, PH2 x 6″, PH3 x 6″TORX screwdriver: T15 x 3″, T20 x 3″, T25 x 4″, T30 x 4″SQUARE screwdriver: S0 x 3″, S1 x 3″, S2 x 4″POZI screwdriver: PZ0 x 3″
